articles.title: Asian Table Tennis C'Ships 2023: Indian men's team assured of medal, marches towards Olympic quota - The Bridge
articles.description: The Indian men's team, featuring Achanta Sharath Kamal, G Sathiyan and Harmeet Desai, pummeled Singapore 3-0 to assure themselves of a medal.
articles.content:
Indian men's team cruised to the semifinals, while the women's team was knocked out of the 26th ITTF-Asian Table Tennis Championships 2023 in Pyeongchang, South Korea, on Monday.
